author: vjr85
title: If you like sleeping on lumpy hard mattresses this is for you
text: Such a shame I got very little sleep here 3rd-5th March. The location is great for getting on the tube into city. Rooms were really clean the shower was powerful water was hot. Staff were very nice. My only complaint is the beds and believe me if it wasn't for the cleanliness I would have given it 1.
